remarks.format: ## Remarks 似乎事件反昇路由事件，但實際上會以間接方式傳送。The event appears to travel a bubbling route but actually travels in an indirect way. 是路由傳送，泡泡圖的基礎事件和每個沿著事件路由會使用相同的處理結果來引發直接路由的事件。 is the underlying event that is bubble routed, and each along the event route uses identical handling to raise the direct routed event . 雖然您可以將標記事件為已處理的這個項目的用途，已處理的狀態不保存事件路由中的其他項目。Although you can mark the event as handled for purposes of this element, the handled state does not perpetuate to other elements along the event route. 不過，您可能想要將事件標示為已處理，以避免一般的執行個體處理常式 (未指定的指`handledEventsToo`) 叫用。However, you might want to mark the event as handled in order to prevent general instance handlers (those that did not specify `handledEventsToo`) from being invoked. 一般的滑鼠事件處理中的預設實作接聽並將它轉換成適當的本機事件。The default implementation for general mouse event handling in listens for and converts it to an appropriate local event. 如果您想要覆寫此邏輯，您必須建立衍生的類別。If you want to override this logic, you must create a derived class. 在衍生類別的靜態建構函式中註冊替代的類別處理常式。In the static constructor of your derived class, register an alternative class handler for . 您無法變更處理行為的滑鼠藉由覆寫。You cannot change the mouse handling behavior of by overriding . 或者，您可以覆寫這個方法以變更處理特定的滑鼠狀態的事件。Alternatively, you can override this method in order to change event handling for a specific mouse state. 不論您選擇呼叫的基底實作，取決於您的案例。Whether you choose to call the base implementation depends on your scenario. 無法呼叫基底會停用該也預期要叫用的上階類別上的滑鼠事件的預設輸入的處理。Failing to call base disables default input handling for that mouse event on ancestor classes that also expect to invoke . 例如，您可以從衍生，並覆寫在您的衍生類別，而不需要呼叫基底; 不過，此覆寫會停用內容功能表上的服務您的控制項，也就是組件的預設行為。For example, you can derive from and override in your derived class without calling base; however, this override disables the context menu services on your control, which are part of the default behavior. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 滑鼠按鈕的動作也是由專用的輸入管理員處理。Mouse button actions are also handled by a dedicated input manager. 其他可依賴滑鼠按鈕的動作，例如輸入和命令繫結的程式設計功能可能會叫用動作的處理常式之前它會公開為一般的滑鼠按鈕動作。Other programming features that rely on mouse button actions, such as input and command bindings, might invoke handlers for the action before it is exposed as a general mouse button action. 如果這些輸入系統功能 mark為已處理的事件不會叫用。If these input system features mark the event as handled, is not invoked. 如果您使用這個類別處理常式將事件標示為已處理時，可能會影響下列事件：和。If you use this class handler to mark the event as handled, you potentially impact the following events: and . 其中一個這些事件可能會接收的項目上引發時收到。Either of these events might be raised on the receiving element when is received. 如果您將標示為已處理的類別中處理這個事件時，仍然會引發子;不過，它們會傳遞事件資料中的處理的狀態。If you mark this event as handled in class handling, subevents are still raised; however, they pass the handled state in the event data. 如果類別處理在處理事件，副的執行個體處理常式不會叫用除非您明確地使用具有`handledEventsToo``true`才能附加處理常式。If the event is handled in class handling, instance handlers for the subevents are not invoked unless you explicitly use with `handledEventsToo` `true` in order to attach handlers. 類別處理常式也不會叫用除非那些類別處理常式向簽章`handledEventsToo` `true`。Class handlers also are not invoked unless those class handlers were registered with the signature with `handledEventsToo` `true`. 藉由處理，當其中隱含類別處理負責處理動作的所有可能的滑鼠按鈕。By handling , you are implying that your class handling accounted for all possible mouse button up actions. 此行為可能會不必要的。This behavior might be unwanted. 因此，小心時將事件標記為已處理的情況下，您在使用這個虛擬方法。Therefore, use caution when you use this virtual method to mark events as handled. 每個特定按鈕的直接事件也有虛擬機器 \* 方法;請考慮是否覆寫這些特定按鈕的類別處理常式可能更適合。Each of the button-specific direct events also has a virtual On\* method; consider whether overriding these button-specific class handlers might be more appropriate. 這個方法沒有任何預設實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在實作中呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供方法來處理從衍生類別相符的事件所建立的類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法沒有任何預設實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在實作中呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供方法來處理從衍生類別相符的事件所建立的類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件，因為路由的事件可以引發由子項目，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料的來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應該嘗試重新引發此事件，在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 藉由覆寫這個方法，或藉由註冊類別處理常式，衍生的類別收到此事件路由事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中的類別處理是適當的一個案例是操作事件資料，並將路由的事件標示為已處理。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. 是專門針對預覽事件的另一個案例是將它們加以處理，因此不會叫用比對的事件反昇類別處理常式標示。Another scenario that is specifically for Preview events is to mark them handled so that the matching bubbling class handlers are not invoked. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法沒有任何預設實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在實作中呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供方法來處理從衍生類別相符的事件所建立的類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件，因為路由的事件可以引發由子項目，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料的來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應該嘗試重新引發此事件，在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 藉由覆寫這個方法，或藉由註冊類別處理常式，衍生的類別收到此事件路由事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中的類別處理是適當的一個案例是操作事件資料，並將路由的事件標示為已處理。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. 是專門針對預覽事件的另一個案例是將它們加以處理，因此不會叫用比對的事件反昇類別處理常式標示。Another scenario that is specifically for Preview events is to mark them handled so that the matching bubbling class handlers are not invoked. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

summary.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 滑鼠按鈕的動作也是由專用的輸入管理員處理。Mouse button actions are also handled by a dedicated input manager. 其他可依賴滑鼠按鈕的動作，例如輸入和命令繫結的程式設計功能可能會叫用動作的處理常式之前它會公開為一般的滑鼠按鈕動作。Other programming features that rely on mouse button actions, such as input and command bindings, might invoke handlers for the action before it is exposed as a general mouse button action. 如果這些輸入系統功能 mark為已處理的事件不會叫用。If these input system features mark the event as handled, is not invoked. 如果您使用這個類別處理常式將事件標示為已處理時，可能會影響下列事件：和。If you use this class handler to mark the event as handled, you potentially impact the following events: and . 其中一個這些事件可能會發生在接收端的項目上時收到。Either of these events may be raised on the receiving element when is received. 如果您將標示為已處理的類別中處理這個事件時，仍然會引發子;不過，它們會傳遞事件資料中的處理的狀態。If you mark this event as handled in class handling, subevents are still raised; however, they pass the handled state in the event data. 如果類別處理在處理事件，副的執行個體處理常式不會叫用除非您明確地使用具有`handledEventsToo``true`才能附加處理常式。If the event is handled in class handling, instance handlers for the subevents are not invoked unless you explicitly use with `handledEventsToo` `true` in order to attach handlers. 類別處理常式也不會叫用除非那些類別處理常式向簽章`handledEventsToo` `true`。Class handlers also are not invoked unless those class handlers were registered with the signature with `handledEventsToo` `true`. 藉由處理，當其中隱含類別處理負責動作下的所有可能的滑鼠按鈕。By handling , you are implying that your class handling accounted for all possible mouse button down actions. 此行為可能會不必要的。This behavior might be unwanted. 因此，小心時將事件標記為已處理的情況下，您在使用這個虛擬方法。Therefore, use caution when you use this virtual method to mark events as handled. 每個特定按鈕的直接事件也有虛擬機器 \* 方法;請考慮是否覆寫這些特定按鈕的類別處理常式可能更適合。Each of the button-specific direct events also has a virtual On\* method; consider whether overriding these button-specific class handlers might be more appropriate. 這個方法沒有任何預設實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在實作中呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供方法來處理從衍生類別相符的事件所建立的類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件，因為路由的事件可以引發由子項目，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料的來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應該嘗試重新引發此事件，在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 藉由覆寫這個方法，或藉由註冊類別處理常式，衍生的類別收到此事件路由事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中的類別處理是適當的一個案例是操作事件資料，並將路由的事件標示為已處理。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. 是專門針對預覽事件的另一個案例是將它們加以處理，因此不會叫用比對的事件反昇類別處理常式標示。Another scenario that is specifically for Preview events is to mark them handled so that the matching bubbling class handlers are not invoked. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件似乎旅遊通道的路由，但實際上會以間接方式傳送。The event appears to travel a tunneling route but actually travels in an indirect way. 為基礎的事件通道路由傳送，且每個沿著事件路由會使用相同的處理結果來引發直接路由的事件。 is the underlying event that is tunnel routed, and each along the event route uses identical handling to raise the direct routed event . 雖然您可以將標記事件為已處理的這個項目的用途，已處理的狀態不保存事件路由中的其他項目。Although you can mark the event as handled for purposes of this element, the handled state does not perpetuate to other elements along the event route. 不過，您可能想要將事件標示為已處理，以避免一般的執行個體處理常式 (未指定的指`handledEventsToo`) 叫用。However, you might want to mark the event as handled in order to prevent general instance handlers (those that did not specify `handledEventsToo`) from being invoked. 一般的滑鼠事件處理中的預設實作接聽並將它轉換成適當的本機事件。The default implementation for general mouse event handling in listens for and converts it to an appropriate local event. 如果您想要覆寫此邏輯，您必須建立衍生的類別。If you want to override this logic, you must create a derived class. 在衍生類別的靜態建構函式中註冊替代的類別處理常式。In the static constructor of your derived class, register an alternative class handler for . 您無法變更處理行為的滑鼠藉由覆寫。You cannot change the mouse handling behavior of by overriding . 或者，您可以覆寫這個方法以變更處理特定的滑鼠狀態的事件。Alternatively, you can override this method in order to change event handling for a specific mouse state. 不論您選擇呼叫的基底實作，取決於您的案例。Whether you choose to call the base implementation depends on your scenario. 無法呼叫基底會停用該也預期要叫用的上階類別上的滑鼠事件的預設輸入的處理。Failing to call base disables default input handling for that mouse event on ancestor classes that also expect to invoke . 例如，您可以從衍生，並覆寫在您的衍生類別，而不需要呼叫基底實作中，不過，這會覆寫停用事件。For example, you can derive from and override in your derived class without calling the base implementation; however, this override disables the event. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件似乎旅遊通道的路由，但實際上會以間接方式傳送。The event appears to travel a tunneling route but actually travels in an indirect way. 為基礎的事件通道路由傳送，且每個沿著事件路由會使用相同的處理結果來引發直接路由的事件。 is the underlying event that is tunnel routed, and each along the event route uses identical handling to raise the direct routed event . 雖然您可以將標記事件為已處理的這個項目的用途，已處理的狀態不保存事件路由中的其他項目。Although you can mark the event as handled for purposes of this element, the handled state does not perpetuate to other elements along the event route. 不過，您可能想要將事件標示為已處理，以避免一般的執行個體處理常式 (未指定的指`handledEventsToo`) 叫用。However, you might want to mark the event as handled in order to prevent general instance handlers (those that did not specify `handledEventsToo`) from being invoked. 一般的滑鼠事件處理中的預設實作接聽並將它轉換成適當的本機事件。The default implementation for general mouse event handling in listens for and converts it to an appropriate local event. 如果您想要覆寫此邏輯，您必須建立衍生的類別。If you want to override this logic, you must create a derived class. 在衍生類別的靜態建構函式中註冊替代的類別處理常式。In the static constructor of your derived class, register an alternative class handler for . 您無法變更處理行為的滑鼠藉由覆寫。You cannot change the mouse handling behavior of by overriding . .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

summary.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 滑鼠按鈕的動作也是由專用的輸入管理員處理。Mouse button actions are also handled by a dedicated input manager. 其他可依賴滑鼠按鈕的動作，例如輸入和命令繫結的程式設計功能可能會叫用動作的處理常式之前它會公開為一般的滑鼠按鈕動作。Other programming features that rely on mouse button actions, such as input and command bindings, might invoke handlers for the action before it is exposed as a general mouse button action. 如果這些輸入系統功能 mark為已處理的事件不會叫用。If these input system features mark the event as handled, is not invoked. 如果您使用這個類別處理常式將事件標示為已處理時，可能會影響下列事件：和。If you use this class handler to mark the event as handled, you potentially impact the following events: and . 其中一個這些事件可能會接收的項目上引發時收到。Either of these events might be raised on the receiving element when is received. 如果您將標示為已處理的類別中處理這個事件時，仍然會引發子;不過，它們會傳遞事件資料中的處理的狀態。If you mark this event as handled in class handling, subevents are still raised; however, they pass the handled state in the event data. 如果類別處理在處理事件，副的執行個體處理常式不會叫用除非您明確地使用具有`handledEventsToo``true`才能附加處理常式。If the event is handled in class handling, instance handlers for the subevents are not invoked unless you explicitly use with `handledEventsToo` `true` in order to attach handlers. 類別處理常式也不會叫用除非那些類別處理常式向簽章`handledEventsToo` `true`。Class handlers also are not invoked unless those class handlers were registered with the signature with `handledEventsToo` `true`. 藉由處理，當其中隱含類別處理負責處理動作的所有可能的滑鼠按鈕。By handling , you are implying that your class handling accounted for all possible mouse button up actions. 此行為可能會不必要的。This behavior might be unwanted. 因此，小心時將事件標記為已處理的情況下，您在使用這個虛擬方法。Therefore, use caution when you use this virtual method to mark events as handled. 每個特定按鈕的直接事件也有虛擬機器 \* 方法;請考慮是否覆寫這些特定按鈕的類別處理常式可能更適合。Each of the button-specific direct events also has a virtual On\* method; consider whether overriding these button-specific class handlers might be more appropriate. 這個方法沒有任何預設實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在實作中呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供方法來處理從衍生類別相符的事件所建立的類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件，因為路由的事件可以引發由子項目，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料的來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應該嘗試重新引發此事件，在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 藉由覆寫這個方法，或藉由註冊類別處理常式，衍生的類別收到此事件路由事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中的類別處理是適當的一個案例是操作事件資料，並將路由的事件標示為已處理。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法沒有任何預設實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在實作中呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供方法來處理從衍生類別相符的事件所建立的類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件，因為路由的事件可以引發由子項目，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料的來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應該嘗試重新引發此事件，在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 藉由覆寫這個方法，或藉由註冊類別處理常式，衍生的類別收到此事件路由事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中的類別處理是適當的一個案例是操作事件資料，並將路由的事件標示為已處理。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. 是專門針對預覽事件的另一個案例是將它們加以處理，因此不會叫用比對的事件反昇類別處理常式標示。Another scenario that is specifically for Preview events is to mark them handled so that the matching bubbling class handlers are not invoked. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法沒有任何預設實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在實作中呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供方法來處理從衍生類別相符的事件所建立的類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件，因為路由的事件可以引發由子項目，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料的來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應該嘗試重新引發此事件，在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 藉由覆寫這個方法，或藉由註冊類別處理常式，衍生的類別收到此事件路由事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中的類別處理是適當的一個案例是操作事件資料，並將路由的事件標示為已處理。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. 是專門針對預覽事件的另一個案例是將它們加以處理，因此不會叫用比對的事件反昇類別處理常式標示。Another scenario that is specifically for Preview events is to mark them handled so that the matching bubbling class handlers are not invoked. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法沒有任何預設實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在實作中呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供方法來處理從衍生類別相符的事件所建立的類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件，因為路由的事件可以引發由子項目，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料的來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應該嘗試重新引發此事件，在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 藉由覆寫這個方法，或藉由註冊類別處理常式，衍生的類別收到此事件路由事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中的類別處理是適當的一個案例是操作事件資料，並將路由的事件標示為已處理。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. 是專門針對預覽事件的另一個案例是將它們加以處理，因此不會叫用比對的事件反昇類別處理常式標示。Another scenario that is specifically for Preview events is to mark them handled so that the matching bubbling class handlers are not invoked. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法沒有任何預設實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在實作中呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供方法來處理從衍生類別相符的事件所建立的類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件，因為路由的事件可以引發由子項目，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料的來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應該嘗試重新引發此事件，在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 藉由覆寫這個方法，或藉由註冊類別處理常式，衍生的類別收到此事件路由事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中的類別處理是適當的一個案例是操作事件資料，並將路由的事件標示為已處理。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法沒有任何預設實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在實作中呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 您可能會呼叫基底之前或之後您的特殊處理，根據您的需求。You may call base either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供方法來處理從衍生類別相符的事件所建立的類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式。The purpose of this method is similar to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 將事件標示為已處理時仍適用於防止一般的執行個體處理常式 (未指定的指`handledEventsToo`) 叫用。Marking the event as handled is still useful for preventing typical instance handlers (those that do not specify `handledEventsToo`) from being invoked. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您衍生的類別類別，您可以使用這個方法並搭配方法，以重新整理之項目的模型。When you derive a class from the class, you can use this method together with the method to refresh the model of the element. 您只需要在進階案例中呼叫這個方法。You only need to call this method in advanced scenarios. 這類進階的案例之一是，如果衍生的類別有多個屬性會影響外觀，而且您想要一次更新基礎的模型。One such advanced scenario is if the derived class has multiple properties that affect the appearance, and you want to update the underlying model only once. 內方法則可以更新屬性類別。Within the method you could update the property of the class. 這個方法有預設的實作類別。This method has no default implementation in the class. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何從衍生類別來建立`Sphere`類別：The following example shows how to derive from the class to create a `Sphere` class: [!code-csharp[Shapes#Sphere](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Shapes/CSharp/Sphere.cs#sphere)] [!code-vb[Shapes#Sphere](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Shapes/visualbasic/sphere.vb#sphere)] 如需完整的範例，請參閱[UIElement3D 球體範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160044)。For the complete sample, see [UIElement3D Sphere Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160044).

span.para: 如果您覆寫這個方法，請務必呼叫基底實作。預設的基底實作會執行反向繼承的屬性狀態的某些內部維護。無法呼叫基底實作，會導致無效此狀態。這個方法會覆寫。並同時也會覆寫實作，和密封它。

If you override this method, always call the base implementation. The default base implementation performs some internal maintenance of reverse-inherited property state. Failing to call the base implementation will invalidate this state. This method overrides . and both also override the implementation of , and seals it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個事件會使用通道路由，因為具有焦點的項目可能的子項目，而非項目實際附加事件處理常式。Because this event uses tunneling routing, the element that has focus might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached. 檢查事件資料來判斷實際擁有焦點的項目中。Check the in the event data to determine the actual element that has focus. 此事件建立的別名附加事件，此類別中，以便屬於類別的成員清單時繼承為基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加至事件處理常式事件會附加至基礎附加事件，並接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|通道Tunneling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應的事件反昇事件是。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件建立的別名附加事件，此類別中，以便屬於類別的成員清單時繼承為基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加至事件處理常式事件會附加至基礎附加事件，並接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 通常就會引發事件一起或，對應到其中的兩個標準的滑鼠按鈕按下。The event is often raised together with either or , which correspond to a press of one of the two standard mouse buttons. 並也是路由的事件，但它們是直接路由的事件，並適當按鈕特有的事件引發時事件到達事件路由中的此項目。 and are also routed events, but they are direct routed events, and the appropriate button-specific event is raised when the event reaches this element along the event route. 請參閱備註或。See Remarks for or . .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|通道Tunneling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應的事件反昇事件是。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown As MouseButtonEventHandler

summary.span: Occurs when the left mouse button is pressed while the mouse pointer is over this element.

span.span: Occurs when the left mouse button is pressed while the mouse pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然這[路由事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)似乎會遵循通道路由項目樹狀結構中，它實際上是直接路由的事件的引發並由每個項目樹狀結構中沿著 reraised 。Although this [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md) seems to follow a tunneling route through an element tree, it actually is a direct routed event that is raised and reraised along the element tree by each . 此事件會報告滑鼠按鈕的細節有基礎的多個相關事件的其中一個事件，這是附加的事件處理的事件路由的每個項目。This event is one of several related events that report the mouse-button specifics of an underlying event, which is an attached event that is processed by each element along an event route. 此事件的事件資料會公開事件資料的基礎事件。The event data of this event exposes the event data of the underlying event. 如果該事件標示為已處理此事件路由，仍然會引發滑鼠按鈕的特定事件;不過，必須新增的滑鼠按鈕的特定事件的處理常式藉由明確呼叫，選項來處理已標示為已處理的事件、 事件接聽程式，才能使用。If that event is marked as handled along the event route, the mouse-button specific events are still raised; however, handlers of the mouse-button specific events must be added by explicitly calling , with the option to handle events that are already marked as handled, in order to be listeners to the event. 如果您將標示處理，您基本上將標示處理路由中的所有進一步的接聽程式和所有相關事件。If you mark handled, you are essentially marking handled for all further listeners along the route, and on all related events. 這可能包含的類別處理常式產生事件這類。This possibly includes class-handler generated events such as . 就概念而言，將此事件 (和其他的滑鼠按鍵事件，對於) 是滑鼠 「 服務 」 (使用所提供的服務定義類別)。Conceptually, think of this event (and other mouse-button events on ) to be a mouse "service" (with the service definition provided by the class). 事件會新增不需要檢查原始的滑鼠事件，事件資料中的滑鼠按鈕狀態 （左右，上下按鈕控制項） 的便利性。The event adds the convenience of not needing to check the mouse button states (left-right, up-down) of the original mouse events in the event data. 針對更進階的案例，例如檢查狀態的標準按鈕，您可能需要使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]上類別，而這些非上。For more advanced scenarios, such as checking for states of non-standard buttons, you might need to use the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] on the class rather than those on . .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

Public Shared ReadOnly PreviewMouseLeftButtonDownEvent As RoutedEvent

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註冊路由事件時，會建立路由事件識別項。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 這些識別項包含用於加入事件擁有者的識別名稱、擁有者類型、處理常式類型、路由策略和公用程式方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 如需有關如何註冊路由的事件的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about registering routed events, see . 如需使用路由的事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see . .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

summary.span: Occurs when the mouse pointer moves while the mouse pointer is over this element.

span.span: Occurs when the mouse pointer moves while the mouse pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當發生這個事件都將滑鼠指標第一次進入項目的範圍中，也當滑鼠指標移動同時仍保有的項目範圍內。This event occurs both when the mouse pointer first enters into the element bounds, and also when the mouse pointer moves while still remaining within the element bounds. 此事件建立的別名附加事件，此類別中，以便屬於類別的成員清單時繼承為基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加至事件處理常式事件會附加至基礎附加事件，並接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|通道Tunneling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應的事件反昇事件是。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event PreviewMouseRightButtonDown As MouseButtonEventHandler

summary.span: Occurs when the right mouse button is pressed while the mouse pointer is over this element.

span.span: Occurs when the right mouse button is pressed while the mouse pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然這[路由事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)似乎會遵循通道路由項目樹狀結構中，它實際上是直接路由的事件的引發並由每個項目樹狀結構中沿著 reraised 。Although this [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md) seems to follow a tunneling route through an element tree, it actually is a direct routed event that is raised and reraised along the element tree by each . 此事件會報告滑鼠按鈕的細節有基礎的多個相關事件的其中一個事件，這是附加的事件處理的事件路由的每個項目。This event is one of several related events that report the mouse-button specifics of an underlying event, which is an attached event that is processed by each element along an event route. 此事件的事件資料會公開事件資料的基礎事件。The event data of this event exposes the event data of the underlying event. 如果該事件標示為已處理此事件路由，仍然會引發滑鼠按鈕的特定事件;不過，必須新增的滑鼠按鈕的特定事件的處理常式藉由明確呼叫，選項來處理已標示為已處理的事件、 事件接聽程式，才能使用。If that event is marked as handled along the event route, the mouse-button specific events are still raised; however, handlers of the mouse-button specific events must be added by explicitly calling , with the option to handle events that are already marked as handled, in order to be listeners to the event. 如果您將標示處理，您基本上將標示處理路由中的所有進一步的接聽程式和所有相關事件。If you mark handled, you are essentially marking handled for all further listeners along the route, and on all related events. 這可能包含的類別處理常式產生事件這類。This possibly includes class-handler generated events such as . 就概念而言，將此事件 (和其他的滑鼠按鍵事件，對於) 是滑鼠 「 服務 」 (使用所提供的服務定義類別)。Conceptually, think of this event (and other mouse-button events on ) to be a mouse "service" (with the service definition provided by the class). 事件會新增不需要檢查原始的滑鼠事件，事件資料中的滑鼠按鈕狀態 （左右，上下按鈕控制項） 的便利性。The event adds the convenience of not needing to check the mouse button states (left-right, up-down) of the original mouse events in the event data. 針對更進階的案例，例如檢查狀態的標準按鈕，您可能需要使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]上類別，而這些非上。For more advanced scenarios, such as checking for states of non-standard buttons, you might need to use the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] on the class rather than those on . .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

Public Shared ReadOnly PreviewMouseRightButtonDownEvent As RoutedEvent

remarks.format: ## Remarks 焦點或滑鼠捕捉會優先於滑鼠指標的所在;因此，如果您接收這個事件的焦點或擷取的項目時，滑鼠指標實際上可能是透過另一個項目。Focus or mouse capture take precedence over where the mouse pointer is; therefore, if you receive this event from a focused or captured element, the mouse pointer might actually be over another element. 此事件建立的別名附加事件，此類別中，以便屬於類別的成員清單時繼承為基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加至事件處理常式事件會附加至基礎附加事件，並接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|通道Tunneling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應的事件反昇事件是。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件可讓元件或應用程式以與裝置無關的方式接聽文字輸入。The event allows a component or application to listen for text input in a device-independent manner. 鍵盤是主要的方法; 不過也可以產生語音、 手寫和其他輸入的裝置。The keyboard is the primary means of ; but speech, handwriting, and other input devices can also generate . 因為索引鍵的組合，在預設鍵盤或透過輸入的法編輯器 — 多個索引鍵的事件可能會引發一個文字輸入的事件。Because of key combinations—either in default keyboards or through input method editors—multiple key events may raise just one text input event. 此事件建立的別名附加事件，此類別中，以便屬於類別的成員清單時繼承為基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加至事件處理常式事件會附加至基礎附加事件，並接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|通道Tunneling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應的事件反昇事件是。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

summary.span: Occurs when the cursor is requested to display.

span.span: Occurs when the cursor is requested to display.

summary.span: This event is raised on an element each time that the mouse pointer moves to a new location, which means the cursor object might need to be changed based on its new position.

span.span: This event is raised on an element each time that the mouse pointer moves to a new location, which means the cursor object might need to be changed based on its new position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件建立的別名附加事件，此類別中，以便屬於類別的成員清單時繼承為基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加至事件處理常式事件會附加至基礎附加事件，並接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 此事件名稱所參考的資料指標不一定是文字游標 （有時稱為插入點）。The cursor being referred to by this event name is not necessarily the text cursor (sometimes known as the insertion point). 相反地，此內容中的資料指標是宣告螢幕上的圖形化顯示數個可能的輸入相關的裝置或在 Windows 程式設計的概念相關的物件。Instead, the cursor in this context is the object that declares the onscreen graphical display related to several possible input-related devices or concepts in Windows programming. 該物件由在 WPF 中的類別。That object is represented by the class in WPF. WPF 輸入的系統可讓您變更這個資料指標，當它表示滑鼠指標的螢幕上的位置。The WPF input system enables you to change this cursor when it represents the onscreen position of the mouse pointer. 您可以使用預先定義的值從列舉型別，或者您可以宣告為影像檔的自訂游標。You can use predefined values from the enumeration, or you can declare a custom cursor as an image file. 接聽事件就不會針對資料指標管理而有效率的技術。Listening for the event is not an efficient technique for cursor management. 相反地，每個項目應該定義自己的資料指標行為和。Instead, each element should define its own cursor behavior with and . 您只應依賴如果您不使用 WPF 架構層級基底項目，或在異常的情況下，其中定義每個項目為基礎的資料指標的行為不符合您的需求。You should only rely on if you are not using the WPF framework-level base elements, or in extraordinary circumstances where defining cursor behavior on a per-element basis does not meet your needs. 如需有關實作資料指標行為，以回應，請參閱。For more information on implementing cursor behavior in response to , see . .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|事件反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 沒有任何已定義的對應通道事件。There is no defined corresponding tunneling event. - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `e`參數的型別為路由的事件的所有資料的通用基底類型; 不過，事件資料應該被授與為最特定的事件資料類型，可供所引發的事件，因為衍生的類別包含實際的特定資料是針對特定的事件時，會引發這個事件的屬性。The `e` parameter is typed as the common base type for all routed event data; however, the event data should be given as the most specific event data type that is available for the event being raised, because derived classes contain the actual specific data properties that are intended for the specific event when it is raised. 不是狀態屬性事件;它也會識別要引發哪個路由的事件。 is not just the state properties for the event; it also identifies which routed event to raise. 此事件引發的模式和路由的事件資料，同時與不同[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件和資料類別，通常只包含事件相關的屬性。This event-raising pattern and the routed event data both differ from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] events and data classes, which typically just contain properties that are related to the event. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最常見的案例，使用這[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)]是您實作時會[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]自訂路由事件，特別是當您實作在處理常式的 「 移除 」 邏輯時相關聯的 「 包裝函式 」 事件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]層級。The most common scenario for using this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)] is when you implement the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] "wrapper" event that is associated with a custom routed event, specifically when you implement the "remove" logic for handlers at the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] level. 如果沒有任何處理常式註冊以比對方法呼叫的輸入的參數的準則，則呼叫這個方法任何作用。Calling this method has no effect if there were no handlers registered with criteria that match the input parameters for the method call. 如果多個處理常式已連結的事件處理常式存放區中，比對準則，也就是第一個處理常式。If more than one handler is attached that matched the criteria, only the first handler in the event handler store is removed. 此行為是配合[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]行為`-=`運算子。This behavior is consistent with [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] behavior of the `-=` operator. 既不`routedEvent`也`handler`可能是`null`。Neither `routedEvent` nor `handler` may be `null`. 嘗試提供其中一個值做為`null`會引發例外狀況。Attempting to provide either value as `null` will raise an exception. 這個方法會忽略`handledEventsToo`加上第一個處理常式是否提供的參數資訊簽章，可讓已處理事件的處理。This method ignores the `handledEventsToo` parameter information, which is provided if the handler was first added with the signature that enables handling of already-handled events. 任一種類型的處理常式會移除。Either type of handler is removed. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

span.span: if the property value should be serialized; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這會傳回`true`如果本機設定。This will return `true` if is locally set. 這`ShouldSerialize`提供方法，因為屬性並沒有簡單的預設值。This `ShouldSerialize` method is provided because the property does not have a simple default value. 這個方法會指出屬性是否已變更其預設值。This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value. 您通常叫用這個方法如果在開發設計工具或開發您自己的控制項併入。You typically invoke this method if you are either developing a designer or developing your own control incorporating a . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 定義預設值使用 ShouldSerialize 和重設方法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/defining-default-values-with-the-shouldserialize-and-reset-methods.md)。For more information, see [Defining Default Values with the ShouldSerialize and Reset Methods](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/defining-default-values-with-the-shouldserialize-and-reset-methods.md). .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件建立的別名附加事件，此類別中，以便屬於類別的成員清單時繼承為基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加至事件處理常式事件會附加至基礎附加事件，並接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 觸控、 滑鼠及手寫筆輸入存在於特定的關聯性。Touch, mouse, and stylus input exist in a particular relationship. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 觸控輸入支援在 Windows Vista](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=160818)並[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information, see [Touch Input Support in Windows Vista](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=160818) and [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|事件反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應的通道事件是。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已[路由事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)使用直接的事件處理路由策略。 is a [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md) that uses the direct event handling routing strategy. 直接路由的事件不會引發路由;相反地，它們會以處理相同的項目引發的狀況。Direct routed events are not raised along a route; instead, they are handled in the same element where they are raised. 不過，它們會啟用路由的事件的行為，例如樣式中的事件觸發程序的其他層面。However, they do enable other aspects of routed event behavior, such as event triggers in styles. 雖然手寫筆輸入的項目，這個事件更多的界限時的追蹤記錄解譯為常值回報屬性值已從`false`至`true`這個項目上。Although tracks when the stylus enters the bounds of an element, this event more literally reports that the property value has changed from `false` to `true` on this element. 此事件建立的別名附加事件，此類別中，以便屬於類別的成員清單時繼承為基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加至事件處理常式事件會附加至基礎附加事件，並接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 觸控、 滑鼠及手寫筆輸入存在於特定的關聯性。Touch, mouse, and stylus input exist in a particular relationship. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 觸控輸入支援在 Windows Vista](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=160818)並[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information, see [Touch Input Support in Windows Vista](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=160818) and [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已[路由事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)使用直接的事件處理路由策略。 is a [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md) that uses the direct event handling routing strategy. 直接路由的事件不會引發路由;相反地，它們會以處理相同的項目引發的狀況。Direct routed events are not raised along a route; instead, they are handled in the same element where they are raised. 不過，它們會啟用路由的事件的行為，例如樣式中的事件觸發程序的其他層面。However, they do enable other aspects of routed event behavior, such as event triggers in styles. 雖然追蹤何時手寫筆離開元素，此事件的邊界更多解譯為常值回報屬性值已從`true`至`false`這個項目上。Although tracks when the stylus leaves the bounds of an element, this event more literally reports that the property value has changed from `true` to `false` on this element. 此事件建立的別名附加事件，此類別中，以便屬於類別的成員清單時繼承為基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加至事件處理常式事件會附加至基礎附加事件，並接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 觸控、 滑鼠及手寫筆輸入存在於特定的關聯性。Touch, mouse, and stylus input exist in a particular relationship. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 觸控輸入支援在 Windows Vista](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=160818)並[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information, see [Touch Input Support in Windows Vista](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=160818) and [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件可讓元件或應用程式以與裝置無關的方式接聽文字輸入。The event allows a component or application to listen for text input in a device-independent manner. 鍵盤是主要的方法，但也可以將語音、 手寫和其他輸入的裝置。The keyboard is the primary means of , but speech, handwriting, and other input devices can also raise . 因為索引鍵的組合，在預設鍵盤或透過輸入的法編輯器 — 多個索引鍵的事件可能會引發一個文字輸入的事件。Because of key combinations—either in default keyboards or through input method editors—multiple key events might raise just one text input event. 此事件建立的別名附加事件，此類別中，以便屬於類別的成員清單時繼承為基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 附加至事件處理常式事件會附加至基礎附加事件，並接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|事件反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應的通道事件是。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註冊路由事件時，會建立路由事件識別項。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 這些識別項包含用於加入事件擁有者的識別名稱、擁有者類型、處理常式類型、路由策略和公用程式方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 如需有關如何註冊路由的事件的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about registering routed events, see . 如需使用路由的事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see . .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

summary.span: Occurs when a finger touches the screen while the finger is over this element.

span.span: Occurs when a finger touches the screen while the finger is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，和手指觸控螢幕，並移動之前不會發生的事件。By default, the and events do not occur until a finger touches the screen and moves. 手指在螢幕上按住卻不必移動它會使用按下並按住行為。Pressing a finger on the screen and holding it without moving it causes the press and hold behavior of a . 按住不放的行為相當於按一下滑鼠右鍵。The press and hold behavior is equivalent to a mouse right-click. 會造成並事件發生在手指觸控螢幕，如設定; 附加屬性`false`此元素。To cause the and events to occur as soon as a finger touches the screen, set the attached property to `false` for this element. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|事件反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate| 型別的。 of type .| - 對應的通道事件是。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定這個屬性會影響的值影響，其接著可能會引發事件。Setting this property affects the value of , which in turn may raise the event. 不過，有影響其他因素，例如包含它的父代的可見性設定。However, has other factors that influence it, for instance the visibility settings of parents that contain it. 項目所在不是不會參與輸入的事件 （或命令），並不會報告在點擊測試。Elements where is not do not participate in input events (or commands) and are not reported in hit testing. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|
